product_name: Sherpani Trip LE Wheeled Duffel - Women's
long_description: Add pizzazz to your travels with the Sherpani Trip LE wheeled duffel. It's got more class than a regular duffel, rolls smoothly with the extendable handle, and stows in an overhead bin. Silicone-coated exterior panels feature an attractive pattern; tote-style handles offer carrying versatility. High-rebound wheels roll smoothly and quietly while you pull using the sturdy, retractable handle. Roomy, single-zippered main compartment features a light-colored lining so you can find your things easily. Sherpani Trip LE wheeled duffel includes 2 exterior zip pockets and 2 interior zip pockets to keep clothing and small items organized. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Add pizzazz to your travels with the Sherpani Trip LE wheeled duffel. It's got more class than a regular duffel, rolls smoothly with the extendable handle, and stows in an overhead bin.
